sentences.sentence: I like ikebana very much and I take classes in it.
sentences.translation: 我很喜欢插花，并而且我由参加插花的课程。

sentences.sentence: You will see some more of the Ikebana, or flower arrangement display by using camellias.
sentences.translation: 你将会看到更多的插花作品，或是利用茶花所做出的花艺展示。
